fields.summary: Creating 99 security groups on VPC fails with odd error

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Repeatedly creating/deleting a stack with 40 security groups causes errors on the ufs host:

{code}
Tue Dec 6 17:22:35 2016 ERROR [NotifyClientUtils:listenable-future-pool-4001] [com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.NotifyClientUtils.handleExecutionExceptionForPolling(NotifyClientUtils.java):147] Error polling for task 000756878880:activity:LoadbalancingDomain:i-52027630
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address
        at com.eucalyptus.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture$Sync.complete(AbstractFuture.java:376)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture$Sync.setException(AbstractFuture.java:353)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture.setException(AbstractFuture.java:185)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.concurrent.AbstractListenableFuture.setException(AbstractListenableFuture.java:228)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncResponseFuture.setException(AsyncResponseFuture.java:88)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$1.fireException(AsyncRequest.java:111)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.doFail(Callbacks.java:161)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.run(Callbacks.java:152)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.concurrent.AbstractListenableFuture$1.call(AbstractListenableFuture.java:175)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address
        at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect0(Native Method)
        at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Net.java:454)
        at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Net.java:446)
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImpl.java:648)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioClientSocketPipelineSink.connect(NioClientSocketPipelineSink.java:108)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioClientSocketPipelineSink.eventSunk(NioClientSocketPipelineSink.java:70)
        at org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.oneone.OneToOneEncoder.handleDownstream(OneToOneEncoder.java:54)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.MessageStackHandler.handleDownstream(MessageStackHandler.java:89)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.MessageStackHandler.handleDownstream(MessageStackHandler.java:89)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.MessageStackHandler.handleDownstream(MessageStackHandler.java:89)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.MessageStackHandler.handleDownstream(MessageStackHandler.java:89)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.MessageStackHandler.handleDownstream(MessageStackHandler.java:89)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.connect(Channels.java:634)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.AbstractChannel.connect(AbstractChannel.java:207)
        at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ClientBootstrap.connect(ClientBootstrap.java:229)
        at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ClientBootstrap.connect(ClientBootstrap.java:182)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequestHandler.fire(AsyncRequestHandler.java:137)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest.execute(AsyncRequest.java:295)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$2.call(AsyncRequest.java:236)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$2.call(AsyncRequest.java:224)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue$EucaFutureTask.run(Threads.java:729)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:786)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)
        ... 4 more
{code}

The following commands were run on a ufs host with a few seconds between each command:

{code}
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
6992
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
7704
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
8303
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
8966
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
10061
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
11951
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
12229
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
13171
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
13828
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
13995
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
14044
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
14111
[root@e-39 ~]# netstat -nt | grep TIME_WAIT | wc -l
14132
{code}

when there are too many sockets in the time wait state connections to the cloud controller fail and errors occur.
fields.summary: Simpleworkflow uses too many http connections

comments.body:
Connection usage is reduced so failures no longer occur when creating/deleting a few stacks with 40 security groups (template attached)

There is still higher connection use than ideal but to address fully would require changes that are too large for 4.4 (i.e. implement connection pooling / persistent connections)

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25734.119.20170117git96ba726.el7}}

*Steps*

# Created federated setup with two Eucalyptus clouds
#* [hspencer-240-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/240/]
#* [hspencer-243-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/243/]
#* {code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-regions
REGION	drake	http://ec2.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://ec2.c-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Created non-eucalyptus account in native region {{drake}}:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a engineering -w > .euca/eng-admin.ini
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-50-security-groups-vpc-template.json}} template, did a few cycles of create/delete stack:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-create-stack EUCA13009-50SGTest --parameter VpcId=vpc-ab6ea8a1 --template-file cfn-50-security-groups-vpc-template.json --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::001458033822:stack/EUCA13009-50SGTest/e0931fa2-7e13-4f1d-b91d-7ed1db9fad09
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
STACK	EUCA13009-50SGTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Cloudformation Template Description => Create 50 EC2 security groups.	2017-01-24T16:17:10.096Z
PARAMETER	VpcId		vpc-ab6ea8a1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-delete-stack EUCA13009-50SGTest --region eng-admin@
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-create-stack EUCA13009-50SGTest --parameter VpcId=vpc-ab6ea8a1 --template-file cfn-50-security-groups-vpc-template.json --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::001458033822:stack/EUCA13009-50SGTest/353805cd-e32e-4d84-8189-94adc277a3fa
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
STACK	EUCA13009-50SGTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Cloudformation Template Description => Create 50 EC2 security groups.	2017-01-24T16:23:25.517Z
PARAMETER	VpcId		vpc-ab6ea8a1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-delete-stack EUCA13009-50SGTest --region eng-admin@
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-create-stack EUCA13009-50SGTest --parameter VpcId=vpc-ab6ea8a1 --template-file cfn-50-security-groups-vpc-template.json --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::001458033822:stack/EUCA13009-50SGTest/17623297-d653-435b-90e0-858b914ce1b1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
STACK	EUCA13009-50SGTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Cloudformation Template Description => Create 50 EC2 security groups.	2017-01-24T16:35:18.830Z
PARAMETER	VpcId		vpc-ab6ea8a1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-delete-stack EUCA13009-50SGTest --region eng-admin@
{code}
# While doing the create/delete stack cycles, monitored the {{cloud-error.log}} on the UFS. The error mentioned in the {{Description}} section was not displayed:
{code}
[root@d-14 ~]# tail -f /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-error.log
	at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ClientBootstrap.connect(ClientBootstrap.java:182)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequestHandler.fire(AsyncRequestHandler.java:137)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest.execute(AsyncRequest.java:295)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$2.call(AsyncRequest.java:236)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$2.call(AsyncRequest.java:224)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
	at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue$EucaFutureTask.run(Threads.java:729)
	at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:786)
	at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)
	... 4 more









^C
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
